properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 14 at 2:42PM MST by NWS Riverton WY
properties.description:
This is a special weather statement from the National Weather
Service Office in Riverton.

* WHAT...Southwest winds of 25 to 35 mph gusting between 40 and
50 mph with localized gusts of 55 to 65 mph along Outer Drive
south of Casper. Areas of patchy blowing snow are also likely.

* WHERE...Natrona County.

* WHEN...Now through 6 PM.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong winds will create patchy areas of
blowing snow and slick roads. The combination of strong winds
and slippery roads will increase the chances of a vehicle
sliding off the road. Use caution when traveling in these areas.

NWSheadline: Gusty Winds and Blowing Snow over Natrona County this Afternoon
